title: Hellwing
data:

|   | A hideous skeletal demon. It swoops through the air on powerful wings of ancient withered skin, taking sadistic joy from harrying those who would try to flee its grasp. |

## Useful Info

[Hellwings]() are pesky [tier-4 demons](/Tier-4_demon "Tier-4 demon") with average melee combat skills and decent regeneration. They can make swooping attacks in range-4: when swooping, they land on the opposite side of a target, and instantly make a melee attack. They are found in [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss") and [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium"), and are often summoned by other monsters through the [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon") spell.

## Tips & Tricks

- Unless you find a hellwing particularly early (mid-Dungeon, Lair), they usually don't pose much of a melee threat. The bigger threat is the hellwing appearing from behind, blocking your escape path.

## History

- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), hellwings had fast regeneration.
- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), hellwings could spawn in the [Hells](/Hell "Hell").
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), hellwings had the [Cigotuvi's Embrace](/Cigotuvi%27s_Embrace_\(spell\) "Cigotuvi's Embrace (spell)") spell and were vulnerable to [silver](/Silver "Silver").
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), they didn't have the swoop attack formerly possessed by [blue devils](/Blue_devil "Blue devil").
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), hellwings had [Teleport Self](/Teleport_Self "Teleport Self") and [Teleport Other](/Teleport_Other "Teleport Other").
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), they couldn't cast Cigotuvi's Embrace.
- Prior to [0.12](/0.12 "0.12"), player-summoned hellwings could be used to gain permanent undead allies.
- Prior to [0.6](/0.6 "0.6"), hellwings were [tier-3 demons](/Tier-3_demon "Tier-3 demon").
html:
Hellwing

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
hellwing 4 
HP 30-61
HD 7
XP 336
Speed 10
AC 16
EV 10
Will 60
Attack1 17 (hit: swoop)
Attack2 10 (hit: plain)


Resistances rPois+
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Demonic
Size Large
Type hellwing, hellwing
Flags
Flying
A hideous skeletal demon. It swoops through the air on powerful wings of ancient withered skin, taking sadistic joy from harrying those who would try to flee its grasp.

Useful Info

Hellwings are pesky tier-4 demons with average melee combat skills and decent regeneration. They can make swooping attacks in range-4: when swooping, they land on the opposite side of a target, and instantly make a melee attack. They are found in the Abyss and Pandemonium, and are often summoned by other monsters through the Summon Demon spell.

Tips & Tricks

  • Unless you find a hellwing particularly early (mid-Dungeon, Lair), they usually don't pose much of a melee threat. The bigger threat is the hellwing appearing from behind, blocking your escape path.

History

  • Prior to 0.30, hellwings had fast regeneration.
  • Prior to 0.28, hellwings could spawn in the Hells.
  • Prior to 0.19, hellwings had the Cigotuvi's Embrace spell and were vulnerable to silver.
  • Prior to 0.18, they didn't have the swoop attack formerly possessed by blue devils.
  • Prior to 0.17, hellwings had Teleport Self and Teleport Other.
  • Prior to 0.16, they couldn't cast Cigotuvi's Embrace.
  • Prior to 0.12, player-summoned hellwings could be used to gain permanent undead allies.
  • Prior to 0.6, hellwings were tier-3 demons.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Hellwing&oldid=76212"

rawPage:
{{version030}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
[[Hellwing]]s are pesky [[tier-4 demon]]s with average melee combat skills and decent regeneration. They can make swooping attacks in range-4: when swooping, they land on the opposite side of a target, and instantly make a melee attack. They are found in [[the Abyss]] and [[Pandemonium]], and are often summoned by other monsters through the [[Summon Demon]] spell.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Unless you find a hellwing particularly early (mid-Dungeon, Lair), they usually don't pose much of a melee threat. The bigger threat is the hellwing appearing from behind, blocking your escape path.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.30]], hellwings had fast regeneration.
*Prior to [[0.28]], hellwings could spawn in the [[Hell]]s.
*Prior to [[0.19]], hellwings had the [[Cigotuvi's Embrace (spell)|Cigotuvi's Embrace]] spell and were vulnerable to [[silver]].
*Prior to [[0.18]], they didn't have the swoop attack formerly possessed by [[blue devil]]s.
*Prior to [[0.17]], hellwings had [[Teleport Self]] and [[Teleport Other]].
*Prior to [[0.16]], they couldn't cast Cigotuvi's Embrace.
*Prior to [[0.12]], player-summoned hellwings could be used to gain permanent undead allies.
*Prior to [[0.6]], hellwings were [[tier-3 demon]]s.

[[Category:Demon]]
